Title: Senior Data Analyst
Description:
Cognism is a market leader in international sales intelligence. Access to our premium data, has helped a wide variety of global revenue teams change their approach to prospecting, resulting in predictable and prosperous outcomes.

Following multiple successful funding rounds and the acquisition of Mailtastic (2020), an email signature solution provider, and Kaspr (2022), a Paris-based sales prospecting tool, there has never been a more exciting time to join us.

As we grow, one of our main objectives is to continue hiring individuals, who are both a professional and cultural fit for our Company. Our values are at the core of everything we do!

Our people;


Are Nice!
Are Collaborative. We’re in this together!
Are Solution-Focused. For every problem, we’ve got a solution!
Are Understanding.
Celebrate Individual Contributors.


We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive global workplace, which encourages you to achieve any goals you may have, while having fun along the way!

About The Role

We have a new exciting position open for the role of Senior Data Analyst.

We are looking for someone with 5+ years of experience in Data Analytics that will be responsible for modelling data to provide clean, accurate datasets so that different users within the company can work with them. The role entails transforming, testing, and documenting data.

Responsibilities

Data Analysis and Interpretation:


Work with cross-functional teams to understand business objectives and data requirements.
Utilize SQL, Spark, and other relevant tools to extract, clean, and analyze large datasets efficiently.
Translate complex data sets into actionable insights and present them in a clear and concise manner.


Business Intelligence


Analyze historical data to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for improvement.
Support ad-hoc data requests and provide insightful analysis to support various business initiatives.


Process Improvement


Identify opportunities to streamline data-related processes and improve efficiency.
Collaborate with IT and data engineering teams to enhance data infrastructure and ensure smooth data flow.


Requirements


Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Data Analyst, with a track record of handling complex datasets and delivering actionable insights.
Strong proficiency in SQL for data extraction, manipulation, and querying.
Proficiency in Spark for handling and processing large-scale data sets.
Knowledge of data modeling, data warehousing, and data pipeline concepts.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen eye for detail.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
Proactive and self-motivated, with the ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment.


We look forward to hearing from you!

Title: Data Analyst Power BI
Description:
En Logicalis Spain estamos buscando un perfil de Analista de Datos con experiencia en Power BI para unirse a nuestro equipo de análisis de datos.




El equipo de Data & Analytics de Logicalis trabaja con clientes nacionales e internacionales, llevando a cabo importantes proyectos de inteligencia artificial y analítica avanzada, estrategia del dato, gobierno, integración y arquitectura, abarcando todo el ciclo de vida del dato.




FUNCIONES

Desarrollar y mantener informes y dashboards interactivos en Power BI que proporcionen insights clave para diferentes áreas de la empresa.
Utilizar Power Query para transformar y preparar datos provenientes de múltiples fuentes, asegurando que los datos sean precisos y estén listos para el análisis.
Crear visualizaciones de datos efectivas y persuasivas que comuniquen insights de manera clara y concisa.
Asegurar que los informes y dashboards estén actualizados y reflejen los datos más recientes, implementando actualizaciones y mejoras continuas.

Experiencia trabajando con Power BI en un entorno profesional.
Dominio de DAX para crear cálculos y medidas.
Experiencia con Power Query para la transformación y preparación de datos.
Conocimientos en lenguajes de programación como Python, o R.
Conocimiento de BBDD SQL y Excel.
Valorable certificaciones en Power BI o análisis de datos.
